# Libraries imports

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

df_CM9_CONV_MIG_TRANS_KEY = spark.read.load('abfss://raw@azuesdlsadl01.dfs.core.windows.net/General/PRDCUSTO/CM9_CONV_MIG_TRANS_KEY/2022/12/12/CM9_CONV_MIG_TRANS_KEY_2022-12-12T08:34:19.7021092.csv', format='csv'
, header=True)

df_RM1_RES = spark.read.load('abfss://raw@azuesdlsadl01.dfs.core.windows.net/General/PRDCUSTO/RM1_RESOURCE/2022/12/12/RM1_RESOURCE_2022-12-12T08:34:19.7521178.csv', format='csv'
, header=True)

df_RM_RES_TYPE = spark.read.load('abfss://raw@azuesdlsadl01.dfs.core.windows.net/General/PRDREFSSCA/RM_RESOURCE_TYPE/2022/12/08/RM_RESOURCE_TYPE_2022-12-08T10:21:26.9255204.csv', format='csv'
, header=True)

df_ARM_MSISDN_RESOURCE = spark.read.load('abfss://raw@azuesdlsadl01.dfs.core.windows.net/General/ARESOM/ARM_MSISDN_RESOURCE/2022/12/16/ARM_MSISDN_RESOURCE_2022-12-16T08:51:50.0170042.csv', format='csv'
, header=True)

# 2019-11- 2019/11/

a = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE > '2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000'") # string vs string
b = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE < '2019-11-05 05:41:34'") # string vs string

c = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 > '2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000'") # timestamp vs string
d = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 < '2019-11-05 05:41:34'") # timestamp vs string

e = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= '2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000'") # timestamp vs string
f = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= '2019-11-05 05:41:34'") # timestamp vs string

g = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE > CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000' AS TIMESTAMP)") # string vs timestamp
h = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE < CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34' AS TIMESTAMP)") # string vs timestamp

i = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 > CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000' AS TIMESTAMP)") # timestamp vs timestamp
j = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 < CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34' AS TIMESTAMP)") # timestamp vs timestamp
w = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 = CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34' AS TIMESTAMP)") # timestamp vs timestamp

k = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000' AS TIMESTAMP)") # timestamp vs timestamp
l = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= CAST('2019-11-05 05:41:34' AS TIMESTAMP)") # timestamp vs timestamp

m = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE > TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # string vs timestamp
n = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE < TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # string vs timestamp
z = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE = TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # string vs timestamp

o = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # timestamp vs timestamp
p = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # timestamp vs timestamp

q = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34.0000000', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # timestamp vs timestamp
r = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM RM1_RESOURCE WHERE SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS2 >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2019-11-05 05:41:34', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')") # timestamp vs timestamp

print(f'a={a.count()}, b={b.count()}, c={c.count()}, d={d.count()}, e={e.count()}, f={f.count()}, g={g.count()}, h={h.count()}, i={i.count()}, j={j.count()}, \
w={w.count()}, k={k.count()}, l={l.count()}, m={m.count()}, n={n.count()}, z={z.count()}, o={o.count()}, p={p.count()}, q={q.count()}, r={r.count()}')

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8        
         """
        # AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 >= CAST('2019-11-05 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
        # AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE_TS1 <= CAST('2019-11-05 23:59:59' AS TIMESTAMP)

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8        
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= '2022-12-07 00:00:00'
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE <= '2022-12-07 23:59:59'
         """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8                                                                                            
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')             
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8                                                                                       
 """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8      
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= '2022/11/12 00:00:00.0000000'                                                                                      
 """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8      
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= '2022/11/12 00:00:00'                                                                                      
 """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8      
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2022/11/12 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')                                                                              
 """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8      
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE2 >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2022/11/12 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')                                                                              
 """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

display(df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA.limit(10))

qstr=r"""SELECT A.RESOURCE_VALUE MDN , A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE FECHA_ACTUALIZA                                                   
            , A.RESOURCE_STATUS ID_ESTATUS                                                        
            , 'BLUE' COLOR                                                                        
            , current_timestamp() FECHA_PROCESO                                                                
        FROM RM1_RESOURCE as A                                                           
            ,RM_RESOURCE_TYPE as B                                                         
          WHERE 1 = 1                                                                                
         AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = B.RRT_ID
         AND A.RESOURCE_status = 'AGING'                                                           
         AND B.RRT_ID = 8                                                                                            
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP('2022/11/12 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')             
         AND A.SYS_UPDATE_DATE <= TO_TIMESTAMP('2022/11/12 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') """

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

qstr = r"SELECT LGC_DN_NUM as MDN_MCM FROM CM9_CONV_MIG_TRANS_KEY WHERE LGC_DN_NUM IS NOT NULL"

df_MDNS_MIGRADOS_MCM = spark.sql(qstr)

The actual query is to delete the rows from DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA - whose MDN MATCHED with MDN_MCM of MDNS_MIGRADOS_MCM table.

    DELETE FROM DWDMART.DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA                                                        
     WHERE MDN IN                                                                                     
             (                                                                                     
               SELECT                                                                              
                 CUA.MDN                                                                           
               FROM DWDMART.MDNS_MIGRADOS_MCM REC                                                  
                   ,DWDMART.DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA CUA                                              
               WHERE 1 = 1                                                                         
               AND REC.MDN_MCM = CUA.MDN                                                           
             )
        
     The same effect can be achived - by creating a new dataframe by selecting all rows from  DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA 
    whose MDN NOT MATCHED  with MDN_MCM of MDNS_MIGRADOS_MCM table.

qstr = r"""SELECT * FROM DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA WHERE 
                         MDN NOT IN (SELECT MDN_MCM FROM MDNS_MIGRADOS_MCM)"""

df_DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA = spark.sql(qstr)

qstr = r"""SELECT concat(MDN, '|',                                                            
       date_format(FECHA_ACTUALIZA, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), '|',                         
       ID_ESTATUS, '|',                                                     
       COLOR)                                                                  
  FROM DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA                                          
WHERE FECHA_ACTUALIZA >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
  AND FECHA_ACTUALIZA <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
"""

df_LISTA_CUARENTENA_TXT = spark.sql(qstr)

qstr = r"""SELECT concat(MDN, '|',                                                            
       date_format(FECHA_ACTUALIZA, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), '|',                         
       ID_ESTATUS, '|',                                                     
       COLOR)                                                                  
  FROM DT_NUMEROS_CUARENTENA                                          
WHERE FECHA_ACTUALIZA >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat('2022/12/12', ' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
  AND FECHA_ACTUALIZA <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat('2022/12/12', ' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
"""

df_LISTA_CUARENTENA_TXT = spark.sql(qstr)

qstr = r"""SELECT concat(RES_VALUE,'|',                                                                                                                                 
             (CASE                                                                                                                                                             
                            WHEN SYS_UPDATE_DATE IS NULL THEN date_format(SYS_CREATION_DATE, 'dd/MM/yyyy')        
                            ELSE date_format(SYS_UPDATE_DATE, 'dd/MM/yyyy')                                                           
                          END) ,'|' ,                                                                                         
             RES_STATUS ,'|',                                                                                                       
             'OCRE')                                                                                                                                                        
FROM ARM_MSISDN_RESOURCE                                                                                                                      
        WHERE RES_STATUS = 'AGING'                                                                                                                                 
        AND RES_TYPE_ID = 10                                                                                                                                         
AND SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')           
AND SYS_UPDATE_DATE <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(current_date() -1, ' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
         """

df_LISTA_CUARENTENA_MTX_TXT=spark.sql(qstr)

qstr = r"""SELECT concat(RES_VALUE,'|',                                                                                                                                 
             (CASE                                                                                                                                                             
                            WHEN SYS_UPDATE_DATE IS NULL THEN date_format(SYS_CREATION_DATE, 'dd/MM/yyyy')        
                            ELSE date_format(SYS_UPDATE_DATE, 'dd/MM/yyyy')                                                           
                          END) ,'|' ,                                                                                         
             RES_STATUS ,'|',                                                                                                       
             'OCRE')                                                                                                                                                        
FROM ARM_MSISDN_RESOURCE                                                                                                                      
        WHERE RES_STATUS = 'AGING'                                                                                                                                 
        AND RES_TYPE_ID = 10                                                                                                                                         
AND SYS_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat('2022/12/12', ' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')           
AND SYS_UPDATE_DATE <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat('2022/12/12', ' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') 
         """

df_LISTA_CUARENTENA_MTX_TXT=spark.sql(qstr)
